title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-9.2 - Modifications and waivers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-9.2 - Modifications and waivers

State Regulations

The department may grant a variance by modifying or
waiving the requirements of this Part if in the opinion of the department a
health hazard or nuisance will not result from the variance. If a variance is
granted, the department shall retain the information specified under section
271-9.3
of this Subpart in its
records for the food establishment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-9.2

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
